dct_alternative_sm: Tabula Cananææ prout tempore Christi et Apostolorum divisa fuit
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Mil. germanica" and "Horae itineris".
Shows topography, drainage, settlements of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of a ship and sea monster.
Appears in Gerard and Jodocus Hondius Mercator's Atlas minor. French edition. Amsterdam, Jan Jansson of Arnheim, 1608. p.583.
